metadataAttributes.Title: FinTech Disruptive Innovation: Implications for Society
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course “FinTech Disruptive Innovation: Implications for Society” help you understand how disruptive innovations create opportunity in finance industry and its impact to society especially your career. You would be able to examine and analyse how FinTech innovations would affect companies that relates to FinTech services and how it might affect your career in finance.
